attributes.action: Change punishments for theft of pets, animals etc and abuse of animals.
attributes.additional_details: People are stealing pets, litters of puppies that are too young to be separated from their mom! Attacking people to steal a much loved pet! Breaking into homes to steal dogs!
attributes.background: Increase sentences for animal abuse and animal theft!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase sentences for all animal cruelty offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565404

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for pet theft: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563711

Introduce a National Pet Exchange Register: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328081

Create a public register of people banned from keeping animals in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573147

Require criminal record checks before the sale/adoption of an animal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558511
